name: Woll
description:
An arcade game made during GCORE Jam.

Throw out triangles. Protect yourself from shrinking WOLL.
4 triangles = 1HP.

Instructions
Arrow keys: Rotate
Space key: Shoot

Designed by 山骨
Coded By Blasin 
Music generated by Mubert https://mubert.com/render 
Global Leaderboard SDK: LootLocker
